# CARL Technical Leadership Presentation

## Overview
Complete presentation package for technical leadership using the CARL (Context-Action-Result-Learning) format.

## Files
- `presentation.html` - Main Reveal.js presentation
- `crib-sheet.html` - Interactive crib sheet for second monitor
- `crib-sheet.md` - Markdown version of crib sheet

## Audience
Technical leadership team including:
- Senior managers
- Systems architects  
- Development team leads
- Technical directors

## Duration
60 minutes total:
- Context (12 min): Architecture evolution, challenges
- Action (20 min): Framework solution, demo
- Results (15 min): Benefits and ROI
- Learning (10 min): Migration strategy
- Q&A (3 min): Discussion

## Key Features
- Live demo capabilities
- Comprehensive Q&A handling
- Schema validation demonstration
- Platform abstraction examples
- Migration strategy details

## Usage
1. Open `presentation.html` in browser for main presentation
2. Open `crib-sheet.html` on second monitor for reference
3. Review objection handling guide before presenting
4. Ensure demo environment is set up

## Customization
This example can be adapted for:
- Different technical audiences
- Varying time constraints
- Specific organizational contexts
- Different demo scenarios
